subject: Medicine
title: Placebos for Children
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Placebos for Children.

hook.text: Children respond to placebos even more strongly than adults.

buildup.text: Their vivid imaginations amplify expectation effects.

discovery.text: Colorful medicines and caring rituals boost healing in kids.

twist.text: Some pediatric trials struggle because placebos work so well.

climax.text: Understanding this helps design better treatments for children.

punchline.text: A child's imagination is powerful medicine.

quiz.question: Why do children often have stronger placebo responses?
